name: Add a product to the cart from the product details page

methodName: Add a product to the cart from the product details page

testSteps.description: Given the user is logged in
Given the user is on the home page
When the user selects a product from the product list

children.description: Select product by name: HTC Touch HD

exception.message:

testSteps.description: And the user navigates to the product details page
And the user adds the product to the cart

Then the product should appear in the cart with the correct details
